Package scheduler.util

Class Router

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduler.util.Router
  • public class Router
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility that assists in routing the application to different screens.

      • getStage

        public static javafx.stage.Stage getStage​(javafx.event.Event event)
        Get the Stage object associated with an Event object.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the Stage object associated with the event

      • addRoute

        public static void addRoute​(java.lang.Class<?> controller)
        Add controller to the route stack. If a controller that does not exist in the controller nav map is attempted to be added, then the route stack is cleared and the main controller is pushed on to the stack.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller to add

      • goToReportView

        public static void goToReportView​(javafx.stage.Stage stage,
                                  java.util.List data,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> colFieldMap,
                                  java.lang.String reportName,
                                  java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,​javafx.util.Callback> factoryFunction)
        Navigate to the report view screen.
        Parameters:
        stage - the stage to display the screen
        data - the data for the table
        colFieldMap - the map of column title to field name
        reportName - the report name
        factoryFunction - the lambda expression to generate the factory for the reports columns
